mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homogeneousMineral (mineralName, reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel, visualClassificationOfReflectivity, internalReflection, markHardness, mohsHardness, vickersHardness, reflectionRotationAngle) VALUES (#{name}, #{reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel}, #{visualClassificationOfReflectivity}, #{internalReflection}, #{markHardness}, #{mohsHardness}, #{vickersHardness}, #{reflectionRotationAngle})
mapper.update: UPDATE homogeneousMineral SET mineralName=#{name}, reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel=#{reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel}, visualClassificationOfReflectivity=#{visualClassificationOfReflectivity}, internalReflection=#{internalReflection}, markHardness=#{markHardness}, mohsHardness=#{mohsHardness}, vickersHardness=#{vickersHardness}, reflectionRotationAngle=#{reflectionRotationAngle} WHERE mineralName = #{name}
mapper.select: SELECT mineralName as name, reflectanceVisualInspectionLevel, visualClassificationOfReflectivity, internalReflection, markHardness, mohsHardness, vickersHardness, reflectionRotationAngle FROM homogeneousMineral
